parameters.name: code
parameters.value:
import json, urllib.request, ssl, base64, random

ctx = ssl.create_default_context()
ctx.check_hostname = False
ctx.verify_mode = ssl.CERT_NONE

os_auth = base64.b64encode("$opensearch_user:$opensearch_pass".encode()).decode()
os_headers = {"Content-Type": "application/json", "Authorization": "Basic " + os_auth}

elk_auth = base64.b64encode("$elk_user:$elk_pass".encode()).decode()
elk_headers = {"Content-Type": "application/json", "Authorization": "Basic " + elk_auth}

query = {
    "size": 500,
    "query": {"bool": {"must": [
        {"range": {"timestamp": {"gte": "now-24h"}}}
    ]}},
    "_source": ["rule.id", "rule.description", "rule.level", "rule.mitre.technique",
                "rule.mitre.id", "data.srcip", "agent.name", "timestamp",
                "data.dstport", "rule.groups", "data.protocol", "syscheck.path"],
    "sort": [{"timestamp": {"order": "desc"}}]
}

try:
    req = urllib.request.Request("$opensearch_url/wazuh-alerts-4.x-*/_search",
        data=json.dumps(query).encode(), headers=os_headers, method="POST")
    resp = urllib.request.urlopen(req, context=ctx, timeout=20)
    data = json.loads(resp.read().decode())
    hits = [h["_source"] for h in data.get("hits", {}).get("hits", [])]
except Exception as e:
    print(json.dumps({"error": "OpenSearch query failed: " + str(e)[:150], "scores": [], "stats": {}}))
    import sys; sys.exit(0)

if len(hits) < 10:
    print(json.dumps({"error": "Too few alerts to sample: " + str(len(hits)), "scores": [], "stats": {}}))
    import sys; sys.exit(0)

high = [h for h in hits if h.get("rule", {}).get("level", 0) >= 10]
low = [h for h in hits if h.get("rule", {}).get("level", 0) < 10]
sample_high = random.sample(high, min(50, len(high)))
sample_low = random.sample(low, min(150, len(low)))
sample = sample_high + sample_low
random.shuffle(sample)

scores = []
for alert in sample[:200]:
    try:
        req = urllib.request.Request("$ml_scorer_url/score",
            data=json.dumps(alert).encode(),
            headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"}, method="POST")
        resp = urllib.request.urlopen(req, timeout=5)
        result = json.loads(resp.read().decode())
        score = result.get("score", result.get("threat_score", 0.0))
        scores.append(float(score))
    except Exception:
        pass

if len(scores) < 5:
    print(json.dumps({"error": "Too few scores: " + str(len(scores)), "scores": [], "stats": {}}))
    import sys; sys.exit(0)

scores.sort()
n = len(scores)
mean_score = sum(scores) / n
median_score = scores[n // 2]
p95_idx = int(n * 0.95)
p95_score = scores[min(p95_idx, n - 1)]
pct_above = sum(1 for s in scores if s > 0.7) / n * 100
pct_malicious = sum(1 for s in scores if s > 0.5) / n * 100

stats = {
    "mean_score": round(mean_score, 4),
    "median_score": round(median_score, 4),
    "p95_score": round(p95_score, 4),
    "pct_above_threshold": round(pct_above, 2),
    "pct_malicious": round(pct_malicious, 2),
    "sample_size": n
}

baseline = None
try:
    bq = {
        "size": 1,
        "query": {"bool": {"must": [{"term": {"type": "baseline"}}]}},
        "sort": [{"@timestamp": {"order": "desc"}}]
    }
    req = urllib.request.Request("$elk_url/ml-drift/_search",
        data=json.dumps(bq).encode(), headers=elk_headers, method="POST")
    resp = urllib.request.urlopen(req, context=ctx, timeout=10)
    bdata = json.loads(resp.read().decode())
    bhits = bdata.get("hits", {}).get("hits", [])
    if bhits:
        baseline = bhits[0]["_source"]
except Exception:
    pass

print(json.dumps({"stats": stats, "baseline": baseline, "sample_size": n}))

parameters.name: code
code
parameters.value:
import json, urllib.request, ssl, base64, datetime

ctx = ssl.create_default_context()
ctx.check_hostname = False
ctx.verify_mode = ssl.CERT_NONE

elk_auth = base64.b64encode("$elk_user:$elk_pass".encode()).decode()
elk_headers = {"Content-Type": "application/json", "Authorization": "Basic " + elk_auth}

results = self.full_execution.get("results", []) if isinstance(self.full_execution, dict) else []
drift_data = {}
for r in results:
    if r.get("action", {}).get("label") == "detect_drift":
        try:
            p = json.loads(r.get("result", "{}"))
            drift_data = p.get("message", p) if isinstance(p, dict) else {}
        except:
            drift_data = {}

stats = drift_data.get("stats", {})
now = datetime.datetime.utcnow().strftime("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")

doc = {
    "@timestamp": now,
    "type": "daily",
    "drift_status": drift_data.get("drift_status", "ERROR"),
    "mean_score": stats.get("mean_score", 0),
    "median_score": stats.get("median_score", 0),
    "p95_score": stats.get("p95_score", 0),
    "pct_above_threshold": stats.get("pct_above_threshold", 0),
    "pct_malicious": stats.get("pct_malicious", 0),
    "sample_size": stats.get("sample_size", 0),
    "mean_shift": drift_data.get("mean_shift", 0),
    "malicious_pct_shift": drift_data.get("malicious_pct_shift", 0),
    "p95_shift": drift_data.get("p95_shift", 0),
    "llm_explanation": drift_data.get("llm_explanation", ""),
    "consecutive_stable": drift_data.get("consecutive_stable", 0)
}

written = []
errors = []

try:
    req = urllib.request.Request("$elk_url/ml-drift/_doc",
        data=json.dumps(doc).encode(), headers=elk_headers, method="POST")
    resp = urllib.request.urlopen(req, context=ctx, timeout=10)
    result = json.loads(resp.read().decode())
    written.append("daily:" + result.get("_id", "?"))
except Exception as e:
    errors.append("daily write: " + str(e)[:100])

if drift_data.get("is_new_baseline"):
    baseline_doc = {
        "@timestamp": now,
        "type": "baseline",
        "mean_score": stats.get("mean_score", 0),
        "median_score": stats.get("median_score", 0),
        "p95_score": stats.get("p95_score", 0),
        "pct_above_threshold": stats.get("pct_above_threshold", 0),
        "pct_malicious": stats.get("pct_malicious", 0),
        "sample_size": stats.get("sample_size", 0),
        "consecutive_stable": 0
    }
    try:
        req = urllib.request.Request("$elk_url/ml-drift/_doc",
            data=json.dumps(baseline_doc).encode(), headers=elk_headers, method="POST")
        resp = urllib.request.urlopen(req, context=ctx, timeout=10)
        result = json.loads(resp.read().decode())
        written.append("baseline:" + result.get("_id", "?"))
    except Exception as e:
        errors.append("baseline write: " + str(e)[:100])

status = drift_data.get("drift_status", "ERROR")
if status == "STABLE":
    msg = "Model Drift: STABLE | mean=" + str(stats.get("mean_score", "?")) + " | " + str(stats.get("pct_malicious", "?")) + "% malicious | " + str(stats.get("sample_size", "?")) + " samples"
elif status == "BASELINE_CREATED":
    msg = "Model Drift: BASELINE CREATED | mean=" + str(stats.get("mean_score", "?")) + " | " + str(stats.get("pct_malicious", "?")) + "% malicious | First run seeded"
elif status == "MINOR_DRIFT":
    msg = "Model Drift: MINOR DRIFT | mean shift=" + str(drift_data.get("mean_shift", "?")) + " | p95 shift=" + str(drift_data.get("p95_shift", "?")) + " | mal% shift=" + str(drift_data.get("malicious_pct_shift", "?"))
else:
    msg = "Model Drift: SIGNIFICANT DRIFT | mean shift=" + str(drift_data.get("mean_shift", "?")) + " | p95 shift=" + str(drift_data.get("p95_shift", "?")) + "\\n" + drift_data.get("llm_explanation", "")[:500]

if len(msg) > 1950:
    msg = msg[:1947] + "..."

print(json.dumps({"written": written, "errors": errors, "discord_msg": msg}))

name: Workflow 6: Model Drift Detector
description: Daily: samples Wazuh alerts, scores via ML, compares against baseline distribution, detects drift, writes to ELK ml-drift index, notifies Discord.
